title: Zoe's Release Skin
body:
I've seen a lot of speculation as to what the skin could be and I'm wondering what everyone else thinks it could be. If there's any other possibilities that I haven't seen, feel free to bring it up!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
And the arcade theme would work great with her summoner spell bubbles.

They are power-ups on the ground. Arcade seems like a natural fit.
I hope whenever she picks up a power up it says 1up

> [{quoted}](name=Lightning I,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=t2kmYjB9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-03T18:33:47.236+0000)
>
> Academy: not teen enough/loli{{sticker:sg-ahri-3}} 
> 
> 
> DJ: ever seen a dj put you to sleep?{{sticker:sg-lulu}} 
> 
> 
> Arcade: kids like games (waiting for Zoe emote)

i don't think skins depends from champion's abilities :)
If is not DJ why does zoe listen the login music of DJ Sona at the end of the teaser?

I would love another DJ skin. That music was dope.
Who wouldn't want another DJ skin?

Gods, not another arcade skin. There's already half of League on that band wagon.
Academy skins seem boring as f***.

Other skins? I heard she's a burst mage. Give her Deathsworn!

I'm not sure, but didn't the teaser officially get shown during the League Live Concert? Right around the Arcade bit? That leads me to believe it PROBABLY is Arcade, but then again, I was barely paying attention because I drown out anything non-assassin related.

https://images.dotesports.com/thumbor/Q-ToPEqgbEjnpA0em0OM2diQJew=/1200x0/filters:no_upscale()/https://dm6jf9380nk1h.cloudfront.net/article/d961a2b8-2484-402b-a2cd-2ad2f463aa7b.png

Looks like ARCADE (more precisely a Splatoon reference)
I'm on a cross between Academy and DJ.
